subject: Web3
title: The Terra-Luna Collapse
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Terra-Luna Collapse.

hook.text: In May 2022, the Terra ecosystem collapsed in 72 hours, wiping out $40 billion. It was DeFi's worst disaster.

buildup.text: TerraUSD was an algorithmic stablecoin that maintained its dollar peg through a balance with the LUNA token.

discovery.text: Anchor Protocol offered 20% yields on TerraUSD deposits. Billions poured in, attracted by the impossibly high returns.

twist.text: When confidence cracked, TerraUSD lost its peg. The algorithm printed trillions of LUNA trying to restore it, crashing both.

climax.text: Life savings vanished. Suicides were reported. Do Kwon, the founder, was eventually arrested in Montenegro.

punchline.text: Forty billion dollars vanished in three days because an algorithm failed.

quiz.question: Why did the Terra-Luna ecosystem collapse?
options: TerraUSD lost its peg and the algorithm to restore it spiraled out of control
